fields.description:
Description:
1.Import the kitchensink from the sample app section of the studio.
2.In the tiapp.xml tick the blackberry target. 
3.Run it on the BB simulator.

Actual Result:
1.It does not build & run on the BB simulator.

Expected Result:
1.It should build & run on the BB simulator.

Note: Right now we are using a BB specific KS built given by Russ.
fields.summary: BlackBerry: Unable to build KitchenSink sample app in Studio
